members.name: Captain America
members.phrase: I CAN DO THIS ALL DAY
powers: Reaction time superior to any Olympic athlete who ever competed

members.name: Iron Man
members.phrase: You Can Take Away My House, All my Tricks and Toys. One Thing You Can't Take Away...I Am Iron Man
powers: Combat Skills Outside of his Armor
Stores his Suit in his Body

members.name: God of Thunder
members.phrase: I Choose to Run Towards my Problems and Not Away From Them. Because That's What Heroes Do

members.name: Hulk
members.phrase: I Just Get so Angry All the Time! Hulk Always... Always Angry

members.name: Black Widow
members.phrase: Regimes Fall Every Day. I Tend not to Weep Over That, I'm Russian, or I Was.

members.name: Hawkeye
members.phrase: Just Can Not Seen to Miss
